name: The Fate of All

tutorials: Toward the final battle against the Black Dragon
The Land of Despair: Section V

description: Enter the Vortex of Stagnation that connects the dark world that appeared in skies of  Mergoda Abyss and Lestania,  and slay the Black Dragon.
steps: Speak with Joseph
Speak with Klaus
Head towards the Zandora Wastelands where the  Vortex of Stagnation can be observed.
Head to Theodor in the Mergoda Ruins
Head towards the entrance to the  Mergoda Ruins: Royal Palace Level  and search for the Black Sword.
Defeat the enemy and destroy the Black Sword
Speak with Beatrix
Head towards the next location and search for the Black Sword.
Defeat the enemy and destroy the Black Sword
Speak with Theodor
Head to Lise and the others waiting in front of the Mergoda Security District.
Head to Travers in the White Dragon Temple
Clear "The Great Dragon Crystal War:  The Sacrificed Capital" by accepting the challenge from Travers.
Report to Travers
Rendezvous with Lise and the others waiting in  front of the Mergoda Security District.
Head towards the gate that appeared in the Mergoda Security District.
Defeat the encountered demons
Speak with Mysial
Plunge into the Vortex of Stagnation.
Report to Travers
Seek out the Black Dragon
Defeat the Black Dragon
